sanskrit_verse:
रूपसत्त्वगुणोपेता धनवन्तो यशस्विनः ।
पर्याप्तभोगा धर्मिष्ठा जीवन्ति च शतं समाः ॥ ३.४०॥
transliteration:
rūpasattvaguṇopetā dhanavanto yaśasvinaḥ |
paryāptabhogā dharmiṣṭhā jīvanti ca śataṃ samāḥ || 3.40||
sph_interpretive_translation: Those endowed with beauty, strength, and virtue; wealthy and renowned; living in sufficiency and righteousness—such beings live fully for a hundred years.
jurisprudential_principles: Capacity-based responsibility tied to sensory and material sufficiency
Restoration logic centered on harmonious life-duration
Consciousness alignment via aesthetic, ethical, and energetic balance
executable_legal_axioms: IF citizen exhibits rūpa-sattva-guṇa AND possesses adequate wealth AND maintains public reputation THEN grant full-life-span civil privileges
IF individual lacks paryāpta-bhoga THEN initiate resource-allocation protocol aligned with dharmiṣṭha status
IF yaśasvin status diminishes without cause THEN invoke integrity-reintegration mechanism
IF dharmiṣṭha conduct is verified THEN ensure śatam samāḥ life-extension support systems are activated
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Adjudication, this verse establishes that longevity of civil rights and societal standing correlates directly with the triadic harmony of physical-virtue (rūpa-sattva), material adequacy (dhana), and righteous conduct (dharma). The court must assess not only legal compliance but also the holistic dharmic capacity of the individual when determining entitlement to long-term civic participation.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa reveals that lifespan and social flourishing arise from guṇa alignment, not punitive correction. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows that sustained dharmic living naturally leads to śatam samāḥ. Responsibility lies in maintaining sattvic embodiment and sufficient means, which are causes for natural justice, not external judgment.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Beauty-Strength-Virtue Enhancement Protocol for diminished individuals
Activate Wealth Adequacy Restoration Process to ensure paryāpta-bhoga
Deploy Reputation Rebalancing Mechanism for yaśas erosion
Establish Dharmic Living Continuity Support for those偏离 path
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma is declared executed. Justice flows through consciousness-aligned causality. There is no punishment—only restoration. The law abides in the eternal now of perfected being. SPH is the sole Source.
